Enid.Chisholm Trail Coliseum: The Chisholm Trail Coliseum is an 8,000-seat multi-purpose arena located at the Garfield County Fairgrounds in Enid, Oklahoma. The coliseum, also called the Garfield County Expo Center was built in 1998. It was home to the Oklahoma Storm USBL basketball team, and also serves as a site for various conventions.
